title: Challenge 0: Tokenization
description: Learn about Scaffold-ETH 2, HardHat compilation and deployment, React app development with Ethereum components and hooks, and NFT deployment to public networks by creating a unique token.

title: Challenge 1: Decentralized Staking
description: Learn about trustless coordination, decentralized applications, and group funding mechanisms where users can work together based only on code by building a contract for group funding efforts.

title: Challenge 2: Token Vendor
description: Learn about ERC20 tokens, the approve pattern for token transfers, and contract-to-contract interactions by building a vending machine that buys and sells a decentralized digital currency.

title: Challenge 3: Dice Game
description: Learn about randomness on deterministic blockchains, the weaknesses of using block hash as a randomness source, and how to predict and exploit weak randomness implementations to guarantee winning outcomes.

title: Challenge 4: DEX
description: Learn about automated market makers, liquidity pools with reserve-based pricing models, token swaps between assets, and how liquidity provider tokens represent shares of reserves and accumulated fees.
